amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $1 million and increases funding for Defense Health Programs by a similar amount in order to address research and development for Duchenne muscular dystrophy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by 1 million and reduce Defense Health Program by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Keating.
